name: Constant
description: Generates a constant color image.

name: CheckerBoard
description: Creates a checkerboard pattern.

name: Noise
description: Generates random noise in the image.

name: Text
description: Creates text overlays in the image.

name: ColorWheel
description: Creates a color wheel pattern.

name: Ramp
description: Generates a gradient ramp pattern.

name: Radial
description: Generates a radial gradient pattern.

name: Grade
description: Adjusts the color and contrast of the input image.

name: ColorCorrect
description: Applies color correction adjustments.

name: HueCorrect
description: Applies hue-based color correction.

name: Invert
description: Inverts the colors of the input image.

name: Exposure
description: Adjusts the exposure of the input image.

name: Saturation
description: Adjusts the saturation of the input image.

name: Posterize
description: Reduces the number of colors in the image for a posterized look.

name: Blur
description: Applies a Gaussian blur to the input image.

name: Sharpen
description: Enhances the edges in the input image.

name: Defocus
description: Simulates out-of-focus effects in the input image.

name: DilateErode
description: Expands or contracts the alpha channel of the input image.

name: Transform
description: Performs a 2D transformation on the input.

name: CornerPin
description: Pins the corners of the input to specified points.

name: Reformat
description: Changes the format of the input image.

name: Crop
description: Crops the image to a specified region.

name: Resize
description: Resizes the input image.

name: Merge
description: Combines two images using various blend modes.

name: KeyMix
description: Merges images based on a key.

name: Primatte
description: Performs chroma keying to extract foreground elements.

name: FrameHold
description: Holds a specific frame from the input sequence.

name: TimeOffset
description: Offsets the timing of the input sequence.

name: Roto
description: Allows creating custom shapes and masks.

name: RotoPaint
description: Enables painting and creating shapes directly on the image.

name: Camera
description: Creates a virtual camera for 3D scenes.

name: Light
description: Adds a light source to a 3D scene.

name: Sphere
description: Generates a 3D sphere object.

name: Axis
description: Creates a transform axis for 3D objects.

name: Shuffle
description: Reorders or extracts channels in the image.

name: Remove
description: Removes specific channels from the input image.

name: DeepRead
description: Reads a deep image format file.

name: DeepToImage
description: Converts a deep image to a standard 2D image.

name: ZDefocus
description: Simulates depth-based defocus effects.
